content.div:
Keeping up with Kim Kardashian's love life is harder than keeping up with her ever-evolving TV franchise. (Seriously, how many Kardashian-based shows are on the air at this point?!)

According to People, Kardashian is now keeping company with her ex, Reggie Bush. The magazine reports that the pair is spending time together as friends -- for now. A source told the mag, "They don't know what will happen. They're taking it slow. They love each other so much and miss each other, but their relationship is so complicated."

It looks like Kardashian has learned something from her 72-day fling -- err, we mean "marriage" -- because the mag reports that the starlet is in no hurry to race into another relationship. The source explained, "Things are up in the air. Kim very much wants to take her time and be single and heal from her divorce."

Just because Kardashian is single, that doesn't mean that she'll be alone forever. The reality TV queen recently sat down with Allure magazine (who knew she could still nab covers?), where she opened up about her desire to become a mother -- and even suggested she may one day be a surrogate for sister Khloe. She told Allure, “Do I want kids of my own? Absolutely...but I don’t know if that’s what’s meant for me. Maybe I’ll just work, work, work, and not think about it.”

The 31-year-old reality starlet may not be thinking about it, but her sister Khloe has been for a while and is struggling to conceive. "Khloe joked with me and said, 'Will you be my surrogate?' I think I have a couple more years when I just want my body to myself. At 35, I promise I’ll consider it.”

-mirandaf@dose.ca

source.title: Kim Kardashian Is Keeping Up with Reggie Bush, Considering Having Her Sister's Baby
